name: ProphecyMatrix
description:
Welcome to the Prophecy Matrix

You are now located in the room matrix and a test awaits you

Game rules.

Game objective: first find the key room, get the key, and then find the exit room to pass the level.
Start the game: Click the black square in the middle of the central room to start the game, start the game before you can choose a door to open.


Room types

Fixed room
Central room: Player's home base, start the game, buy function cards, get initial function cards, modify nickname, view high score list.
Empty room: Nothing. Occasionally there will be dropped prophecy coins.
Key room: Get a key card.
Exit room: Use the key card to pass the level.

Safe Room.
No damage to the player, the player can choose to solve the puzzle to get a reward or just pass.

Safe Room 01: Randomly get function cards, sometimes need to pay.
Safe room 02: Spend money to cast color to get random points reward, effective after passing, need to pay 2￥. Double bets are supported.
Safe Room 03: Pad challenge. Receive prophecy coins and random feature card rewards by memorizing the order in which the pads light up.
Safe Room 04: Rock Paper Scissors. Get prophecy coins rewarded by guessing.
Safe Room 05: Prophecy, which reveals the shadow of any room.
Safe room 06: Find the same one among many donut patterns to get prophecy coins reward.
Safe Room 07: Cube Quest, help the cube to complete its needs and get a score reward according to the completion time.

Dangerous Room
May kill the player to end the game.

Dangerous Room 01: Kills the player directly upon entry. May use life cards to offset death.
Danger Room 02: Ask the player a question, answer incorrectly to kill the player, answer correctly to open the door. Answer cards may be used to answer questions.
Dangerous Room 03: A glass paved path where the player must choose correctly each time to get to the other side. Most of the correct glass panels can be viewed using the see-through card.
Danger Room 04: Consists of four two-choice death doors that can only be opened through them.
Danger Room 05: Draw, extend the edge to draw the specified figure, out of the circle will fail to die, successfully open the door.
Dangerous room 06: traverse the obstacles, open the door through, fail and die.
Dangerous room 07: Giant orb passage. The orb rolls down from the high, there is a dodge mouth on the side, successfully walk up the high platform can leave.

Restricted Room
Restrictions on the player's play, but will not kill the player.

Restricted room 01: Deprive players of any 1 function card.
Restricted room 02: After entering the room, it becomes a one-way room, only two doors can be passed.
Restricted room 03: after entering the room is randomly transported to another empty room (if there is no empty room still stays in the current room)
Restricted room 04: Blackout room, after entering the room, the power goes out briefly, all the hints on the doors disappear, and you can't use the shutdown card and perspective card.
Restricted room 05: After entering the room, turn all maps that have been opened back into shadows.
Restricted room 06: After entering the room, reduce 2 money, if not, no reduction.

What is more interesting is that there are many function cards available in the room. Using these cards efficiently can help you get through the challenges.

Now for the Prophecy Matrix challenge!
